name: Alien Splatter Redux
description: "BLAH BLAH BLAH 8-bit, BLAH BLAH BLAH, blow stuff up. BLAH BLAH BLAH, retro." BLOWING INTO THE CARTRIDGE NOT REQUIRED!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: Pentium 4 or higher Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256MB or higher DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 30 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7,8,10 Processor: Core Duo or higher Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 30 MB available space
